error.signature: Error: Module version requirements have changed: version constraint not met
error.regex: (Module .+ version .+ (mismatch|constraint|incompatible)|no available version .+ matches|version constraints .+ module)

verdict.summary: Module version specified in configuration does not match available versions in the registry.

dead_ends.action: Pin to a specific commit hash of a registry module
dead_ends.why_fails: Terraform Registry modules are versioned by semver tags, not commit hashes; this only works for git sources
Without version constraints, terraform init may pull breaking changes from newer module versions

workarounds.action: Check available versions in the registry and update the version constraint
workarounds.how: Visit registry.terraform.io for the module, update version = "~> X.Y" in the module block

workarounds.action: Run terraform init -upgrade to fetch the latest matching version
workarounds.how: terraform init -upgrade will re-evaluate version constraints and download compatible versions
